definition: no matter what/despite/to allow (sb to act arbitrarily)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
lit. sitting at ease in a fishing boat despite wind and storm (idiom); to stay calm during tense situation/a cool head in a crisis
pinyin: ren4 ping2 feng1 lang4 qi3 , wen3 zuo4 diao4 yu2 tai2
containing_words.word: 任凭风浪起，稳坐钓鱼台

sentences.english: Associate yourselves, O ye people, and ye shall be broken in pieces;
sentences.chinese: 列国的人民哪，任凭你们喧囔，终必破坏。

sentences.english: We have a good assortment of goods to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 本公司货色齐全，花色多样，任凭挑选。

sentences.english: Freeing to the tooth bares in the sun, sending out radiant diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 任凭牙齿裸露在阳光下，发出晶莹的光圈。

sentences.english: Her matronly fame was trodden under all men's feet.
sentences.chinese: 她那主妇的声名任凭所有的人践踏在脚下。

sentences.english: This shouldn't be left entirely to his discretion.
sentences.chinese: 这事不能任凭他一人决定。

sentences.english: For the young Mo, despite tears open into flowers.
sentences.chinese: 为陌上少年，任凭泪水开成花。

sentences.english: This is one piece of dogmatism that a scientist can allow himself.
sentences.chinese: 这一条教条定论是一个科学家能够任凭他自己接受的。

sentences.english: I am unable, despite feeling only to lead me to take the road ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我很无力，只能任凭感觉来带引我去走前面的路。

sentences.english: But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣说，任凭死人埋葬他们的死人，你跟从我吧。

sentences.english: No matter, I like a bitch as loud cry, without looking.
sentences.chinese: 任凭我像个泼妇一样，大声哭喊，头也不回。

sentences.english: Alloy steel body, higher stability, let the beat is not easy to damage.
sentences.chinese: 合金钢车身，稳定性更高，任凭摔打不易损坏。

sentences.english: They were lost at the sea, at the mercy of the wind and weather.
sentences.chinese: 他们在海上迷了路，任凭风和天气的摆布。

sentences.english: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways.
sentences.chinese: 他在从前的世代，任凭万国各行其道。

sentences.english: I cuddled up to her mother and sat down beside her, let the mother in the ears is always nagging.
sentences.chinese: 我紧挨着母亲身边坐下，任凭母亲在耳边不停的唠叨。

sentences.english: Have you let Artemis make you desperate and weak?
sentences.chinese: 你有任凭亚底米使你绝望輭弱吗？

sentences.english: In this world, they are allowed to imagine the author Feiteng gallop.
sentences.chinese: 在这个世界里，作者任凭想象驰骋飞腾。
